definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
sweetheart/one's true love/the person of one's thoughts

sentences.english: In a word, the characters reflect each other's desires with an extremely introspective attitude.
sentences.chinese: 畫中人以某種極端內省的姿態照映出彼此的慾望。

sentences.english: I am still a sensitive guy.
sentences.chinese: 看來我還是一個性情中人呀。

sentences.english: He focused by thinking how much he would like to kill the man he drew.
sentences.chinese: 他多想殺掉畫中人，他靠着這種想法來集中精力。

sentences.english: Singleness is meant to be a “waiting period” for finding the right person.
sentences.chinese: 單身是爲找到意中人的一段等待期。
他是一個能鼓舞人心的同道中人。

sentences.english: Reports that will show Mirror mirror on the degree of body temperature.
sentences.chinese: 報道稱，鏡面上會顯示鏡中人體溫的度數。

sentences.english: So how safe would people be with wolves in the wild?
sentences.chinese: 那麼野外中人和狼在一起是否安全呢？

sentences.english: The face and Braincase follow different patterns of growth.
sentences.chinese: 個體發育中人的面部和腦顱各按不同模式生長變化。

sentences.english: You may realize that I am a sentimental girl. When I love a man I usually devote myself into the love.
sentences.chinese: 我是個性情中人，要是愛一個人，就會全身心投入。

sentences.english: And I, the ring myself, do not understand how it all happened.
sentences.chinese: 而我，這個圈中人，卻不明白這一切是如何發生的。

sentences.english: Describe the voice your character is using and any inflection.
sentences.chinese: 描述劇中人說話的聲音和任何音調轉變。

sentences.english: You were my high school sweetheart , And still are.
sentences.chinese: 高中時代，你是我的意中人，一直到。

sentences.english: The player number decreasing minimum cost spanning tree game.
sentences.chinese: 局中人數目變化的最小費用支撐樹對策問題。

sentences.english: Art confident that thou thyself art a guide of the blind, a light of them that are in darkness.
sentences.chinese: 又深信自己是瞎子的響導，是黑暗中人的光明。

sentences.english: Slang is the tongue of those who sit in darkness.
sentences.chinese: 黑話是黑暗中人的語言。

sentences.english: Mid world Ronggui people, Chen Jiaqing in this translation.
sentences.chinese: 世間榮貴月中人，嘉慶在今翻譯辰。

definition: the younger generation/those who come after
